Perfect.
Downvoted cause most of these are not Dragonball.
should upvote because I was using Dragonball as a term to refer to Dragonball, Dragonball Z, and Dragonball Super.
I'll give you your point back. No upvotes though. Dragonball is the best one.
http://mrwgifs.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/04/Kronks-Mission-Accomplished-Reaction-Gif.gif

Where are the control mages?
{{champion:163}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:26}}

{{champion:163}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:34}}  are all Disruptors, {{champion:26}} is an enchanter, and {{champion:127}} is actually a burst mage.
Disruptors and enchanters are both technically not a mage class, but rather subclasses of Controller, Which is essentially what control mages were.
Lots of people get caught by liss being a burst mage, but she compares best with other burst mages so she is one.

It's kinda strange how they define burst mage now. It's not about the burst so much as how they burst.
If they lock down an enemy (or multiple enemies) then use the burst combo, that's a burst mage.
(but then pretty much all mages have a hard cc so idk)

best way to seperate the five categories?
Burst mages make on person disapear, while generally creating some collateral damage
Battle mages kinda just want to hit everyone.
Artillery mages are stupid high range that is reliable.
Encahnters have incredibly powerful ally buffs.
And disruptors are the collateral part of a burst mage plus fucking with the enemies position.
All of the yes.
I thought I was going to enjoy this post but then i saw that you used gifs from DBZ and DBS not just DB I'm really dissapointed
to be fair, classic dragonball doesn't have as good of representations of mages.
Was that budokai tenkaichi 3 for burst?
pretty sure that's dragon ball z resurrection of f
